data.text: @hazelmpinner Oh no! Sorry to hear that. Hope it’s not too bad for you.
@Sharifahlee4 Thank you Sharifah. Well maybe being ill ill will give my body the chance it needs to rest 🤞
@hazelmpinner Oh gosh Hazel. It’s like a never ending saga - poor you. Take care my lovely x x x
@hazelmpinner Hope your symptoms stay mild xx
@hazelmpinner Oh no, sorry to hear that lovely, hope you don't go too badly with it and recover soon.
@hazelmpinner Sorry you’re not well… but that looks amazing yum yum. Apart from the gherkins! 🤢

@Daydream512 Thank you. Feeling incredibly fortunate to have have a safe home with medication, food and warmth while I'm ill. Keep thinking of the people of Ukraine and other places under attack who are ill and it breaks my heart.
@hazelmpinner Sorry to hear it’s caught you, hope you recover soon x
@hazelmpinner Oh no hope you feel better soon xxx
